title: Dark Souls
summary: developed by FromSoftware and published by Namco Bandai Games.

title: Shin Megami Tensei IV
summary: Shin Megami Tensei IV is a Japanese post-apocalyptic role-playing video game developed by Atlus for the Nintendo 3DS.

title: Undertale
summary: is a 2D role-playing video game created by indie developer Toby Fox.
